sql.if:
select a.id as vehid, a.cheliangpaizhao, a.chepaiyanse, c.jiashiyuanxingming, c.shoujihaoma, d.dept_name as deptname, b.id, b.jsyid, b.`status`, b.type, b.date, b.vehimg, b.remark, b.fujianremark, b.jcrsignatrue, b.address, case when IFNULL(b.id,'') = '' then '未完成' else '已完成' end as statusshow from anbiao_vehicle a left join ( select * from anbiao_car_examine_info where left(date,7) = left(#{date},7) ) b on b.vehid = a.id left join anbiao_jiashiyuan c on b.jsyid = c.id and c.isdelete = 0 inner join (
) d on a.dept_id = d.id where 1=1 and a.is_deleted = 0

SELECT a.jcrsignatrue, b.dept_name as deptName, f.jiashiyuanxingming, c.cheliangpaizhao, a.id as infoId, a.vehid, a.deptid as deptId, a.`status`, a.date,
d.id as remarkId, d.examid, d.xiangid
FROM `anbiao_car_examine_info` a INNER JOIN (
) b on b.id = a.deptid LEFT JOIN anbiao_vehicle c ON a.vehid = c.id and c.is_deleted=0 left join anbiao_car_examine_info_remark d on a.id = d.examid LEFT JOIN anbiao_cheliang_jiashiyuan_daily e on c.id = e.vehid and e.vstatus = 1 left join anbiao_jiashiyuan f on e.jiashiyuanid = f.id and f.isdelete=0 WHERE
c.id=#{vehid}
and YEAR(a.date)=YEAR(#{date}) and MONTH(a.date)=MONTH(#{date})
ORDER BY a.id,a.date
